thread.title: Adele Gives Update on New Album
thread.title_full: Adele Gives Update on New Album - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Adele Gives Update on New Album
text:
This morning, Adele tweeted a note about her forthcoming album, expected to be called 25. In it, she describes it as a "make-up record" and explains the delay since 2011's 21. "I'm sorry it took so long, but you know, life happened," she concludes. Read it below.
pic.twitter.com/dDImEhKt10
— Adele (@Adele) October 21, 2015
This past weekend, viewers of "The X Factor " in the UK were treated to an ad that seems to be a preview of a new Adele song. Watch it below.
As per previous reports, the new record will feature collaborations with Tobias Jesso Jr, Max Martin, Danger Mouse, Ryan Tedder, and potentially Damon Albarn. »
